description: INTERNAL MERGE: Normalize 024$q (despite both base and source have crappier values). MRA-309 and MRA-311: normalize 506$a and 534$p as well.
comment: NB! 506$a missing final punc is not added; as the base field is not changed, it stays as it is.
comment #2: Source fields 020 double is a test relocated here after refactoring addField.js
comment #3: MRA-422: illustratör translations. As of 2023-09-XX base-specific X00$e subfields are translated as well
comment ¤4: 2023-09-08: Some $q abbrs are already handled by a normalize-qualifying-information validator
skipComment: Skip before editing test for internal merge
